Title: Prohibits banking organizations from issuing mail-loan checks without request or application therefor
Summary: Prohibits banking organizations from issuing mail-loan checks without request or application therefor; provides that failure to destroy or return a mail-loan check does not constitute an acceptance thereof; provides that mail-loan checks shall have the transaction fee and interest rate included on the check.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to mail-loan checks
